definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
curdled milk or fruit juice/also pr. [luo4]

sentences.english: Rich in calcium, Casein helps contribute to milk's white color.
sentences.chinese: 富含鈣質的乾酪素對牛奶呈現白色起到一定作用。

sentences.english: "Cottage cheese provides two different types of protein: whey and casein, " Carlucci says.
sentences.chinese: 茅屋芝士提供兩種蛋白質，乳清和乾酪素。

sentences.english: The molecules that make up Casein and cream reflect light.
sentences.chinese: 構成乾酪素和奶酪的分子反射光線。

sentences.english: The membrane separation for casein zymohydrolysis was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以乾酪素酶解產物爲介質對膜分離進行了研究。

sentences.english: Whey are by product of the industrial production of cheese and casein.
sentences.chinese: 乳清是工業生產乾酪及乾酪素的副產品。
